import Button from './Button' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Transcription = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState() const [language, setLanguage] = useState() const [output, setOutput] = useState() const [speech, setSpeech] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("HI") setInput('') setLanguage('') setOutput('') setSpeech('') } return (
) } export default Transcription
